name: Intel Fusion Cell Ops
description: Battle rhythms, analytic standards, and dissemination drills for squadron and Delta fusion cells supporting JADC2.

cards.title: Fusion Battle Rhythm Design
cards.description: Lay out a 24-hour timeline that syncs collection, PED, targeting boards, and commander updates into a repeatable fusion cadence. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: A disciplined fusion battle rhythm keeps every intel node pointed at the same decision.

cards.title: All-Source Worksheet Build
cards.description: Construct a standard all-source worksheet capturing SIGINT, GEOINT, OSINT, and cyber indicators tied to each threat object. Ref: AFI 14-133.
cards.summaryText: Worksheets are the fusion cell's single source of truth—build them right.

cards.title: Data Conditioning Drill
cards.description: Rehearse extracting, cleaning, and normalizing sensor outputs (TLEs, RF hits, telemetry) so analytics scripts ingest without delay. Ref: JADC2 Data Reference Architecture.
cards.summaryText: Dirty data kills fusion timelines—condition it before the fight.

cards.title: Multi-INT Correlation Board
cards.description: Lead a board that walks commanders through each INT and the fused narrative with confidence statements and COAs. Ref: AFMAN 14-202.
cards.summaryText: Correlation boards translate raw INTs into commander-ready narratives.

cards.title: JIPTL Support Reps
cards.description: Practice stuffing intel justifications, desired effects, and weaponeering notes into the Joint Integrated Prioritized Target List package. Ref: AFI 13-1AOCV3.
cards.summaryText: Targeting boards move faster when intel inputs are precise and defensible.

cards.title: JADC2 API Familiarization
cards.description: Hands-on reps with ABMS/JADC2 data APIs to understand schema, authentication, and latency impacts. Ref: ABMS Dev Sec Ops Guide.
cards.summaryText: Fusion cells should treat APIs like any other sensor—they need constant verification.

cards.title: Analytic Tradecraft Review
cards.description: Apply ICD 203 analytic tradecraft standards to recent products, capturing sourced statements, assumptions, and alternatives.
cards.summaryText: Tradecraft discipline keeps fusion products credible under scrutiny.

cards.title: Indications & Warnings Matrix
cards.description: Populate an I&W matrix that links indicators, thresholds, and associated collection plans for space threats. Ref: AFMAN 14-304.
cards.summaryText: Warning intel should specify action the moment an indicator trips.

cards.title: Coalition Releasability Drill
cards.description: Walk through derivative classification and foreign disclosure steps before providing fused products to CSpO partners. Ref: DoDM 5200.01.
cards.summaryText: Fast releasability decisions keep coalition partners in the fight.

cards.title: Fusion Cell Contingency SOP
cards.description: Draft step-by-step SOPs for loss of power, comms, or toolsets so fusion continues under degraded ops. Ref: AFMAN 10-100.
cards.summaryText: Contingency SOPs turn chaos into a checklist when systems fail.

cards.title: Hotwash Capture
cards.description: After each major event, collect metrics, friction points, and opportunities to update TTPs. Ref: AFI 90-1601.
cards.summaryText: Every fusion event should produce lessons learned within 24 hours.

cards.title: Intel-to-Sto Handoff
cards.description: Package fused assessments into the Space Tasking Order with clear tasks, risk, and follow-up collections. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Fusion work only matters when it drives the next STO tasking.
